pages.text: $(d)Grass Seeds$() can be used on blocks like Dirt to turn them into Grass.$(br2)Specifically, it works on any block with the tag $(3)irregular_implements:grass_seeds_compatible$().
pages.title: Grass Seeds

pages.text: There are also $(d)Colored Grass Seeds$(), which plant Colored Grass of their respective color.$(br2)They act exactly the same as regular Grass Blocks, but are colored.
pages.title: Colored Grass Seeds
